Title: Umbraco Active Directory Role Provider
Description:
Active Directory Role Provider for umbraco membership (and sample user control)

With this role provider, a user control and some IIS configuration you can do seamless authentication (no login prompt) onto your umbraco site and user the Active Directory roles insider umbraco.

Project Description
Active Directory Role Provider for umbraco membership (and sample user control)

With this role provider, a user control and some IIS configuration you can do seamless authentication (no login) onto your umbraco site and user the Active Directory roles insider umbraco.

How to use the provider

read the documentation very very carefully. this is a very experimental installation
